definitions.definition: An inn that provides overnight accommodation for travellers (and, originally, their horses ).
The art and skill of guest management at a commercial facility such as a hotel , inn, motel , bed and breakfast , or hostel .

main_definition: ( countable ) An inn that provides overnight accommodation for travellers (and, originally, their horses ).
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable ) The art and skill of guest management at a commercial facility such as a hotel , inn, motel , bed and breakfast , or hostel .
